question: What is "Fiann Paul" famous for?
explanation: Fiann Paul is an Icelandic explorer, athlete, artist and speaker. He is the world's most record-breaking explorer and holds the world's highest number of performance-based Guinness World Records ever achieved within a single athletic discipline. Fiann is known for being the fastest ocean rower (2016) and the most record-breaking ocean rower (2017). As of 2020, he is the first and only person to achieve the Ocean Explorers Grand Slam (performing open-water crossings on each of the five oceans using human-powered vessels).
